trans-unit.source: Allows coordination of initialization for a component and its dependent properties.
trans-unit.target: 允许协调组件及其依赖属性的初始化。

trans-unit.source: You should implement this interface when your component has initialization dependencies on other components that also implement the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitializeNotification> interface.
trans-unit.target: 组件还实现的其他组件包含初始化依赖关系时，应实现此接口<xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitializeNotification>接口。

trans-unit.source: You can check to see if the dependent components have completed initialization by checking the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitializeNotification.IsInitialized%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以检查以了解是否从属组件已完成初始化，通过检查<xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitializeNotification.IsInitialized%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitializeNotification> is implemented by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl> types.
Occurs when initialization of the component is completed.
trans-unit.target: 组件初始化完成时出现。

trans-unit.source: This event typically occurs during the call to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize.EndInit%2A> method for the component, but it may occur later if the component has dependent controls that implement the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitializeNotification> interface and the dependent controls have not completed initialization.
trans-unit.target: 此事件通常发生在调用过程<xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize.EndInit%2A>如果组件依赖这些控件可实现，该组件，但它的方法可能会更高版本出现<xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitializeNotification>接口和依赖控件尚未完成初始化。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the component is initialized.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否初始化组件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate the component has completed initialization; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，说明组件已完成初始化；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitializeNotification.IsInitialized%2A> property is automatically set to `false` when the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize.BeginInit%2A> method is called, and `true` when the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize.EndInit%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitializeNotification.IsInitialized%2A>属性自动设置为`false`时<xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize.BeginInit%2A>调用方法时，和`true`时<xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize.EndInit%2A>调用方法。
